titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I 'kept my room' only leaving it to attend Evensong. The weather was wet, and my left arm continued to be rheumatical. Beyond finishing the college sermon, and writing to Olive, and Jack Boden, I did nothing but read idly for my own pleasure.
